Items.Title: Application No. 20215006 HAM (505 West 134th Street Cluster) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law, requesting the waiver of the area designation requirements of Section 693 of the General Municipal Law and Sections 197-c and 197-d of the Charter, approval of an urban development action area project, and approval of an exemption from real property taxes for property located at 505 West 134th Street (Block 1988, Lot 27), 523 West 134th Street (Block 1988, Lot 12), and 527 West 134th Street (Block 1988, Lot 8), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 9.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
